# joints

**Instance Property**

The joints connected to this physics body.

## Declaration

```swift
var joints: [SKPhysicsJoint] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property holds an array of [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKPhysicsJoint] objects that define all joints added to the scene’s physics world that are connected to this physics body.
title: joints
